   sphinx-quickstart on Fri Nov 13 18:36:17 2020.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Anki's documentation!
================================
This repo contains the documentation of source code for the computer version of `Anki`_.
you can check for `writing addons`_ documentation also for more help.
For data base documentation you can check `AnkiDorid`_.

**Note**: This unofficial documentation generated by sphinx python module, don't hesitated to contribute to it to improve the this documentation.

.. _Anki: https://apps.ankiweb.net/
.. _writing addons: https://addon-docs.ankiweb.net/#/
.. _AnkiDorid: https://github.com/ankidroid/Anki-Android/wiki/Database-Structure

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   anki
   anki.importing
   aqt
   genhooks_gui
   tools
